cards.rules_text:
When Thriving Grubs enters, you get {E}{E}.
Whenever Thriving Grubs attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

Whenever another nontoken permanent you control is put into a graveyard from play, you may pay 2 life. If you do, another target creature manufactures 2.
When Dovin Baan dies, you may sacrifice four artifacts you control. If you do, return him to the battlefield tapped with a -1/-1 counter on it.

Prowess
[i]Raid[/i] - If you've attacked this turn, casting a noncreature spell causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

Haste
During your turn, Zurgo has indestructible.
Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on a creature you control, you get that many {E}.
When Zurgo attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, creatures you control gain menace until end of turn.

Morph {2}{G}{U}{W}
At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. You may pay {2}. If you do, manifest it. Otherwise, put it into your hand.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“When you can afford anything, purchase power.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:

Sacrifice a land: You get {E}{E}. Activate only once per turn.
{E}{E}{E}{E}: Servos and Thopters you control get +2/+2 and gain deathtouch until end of turn.

{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Sacrifice Waste Land: Destroy target nonbasic land. That land's controller creates a Wastes token.

Flying

{2}{B}, Pay {E}{E}{E}{E}: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control tapped.

First strike
When Longtusk Pride enters, if it isn't a token, create a token that is a copy of it.
Whenever a Cat you control deals combat damage, put a +1/+1 counter on each Cat you control.
{T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Scalding Tarn: Search your library for an Island or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Creatures you control gain +1/+1 and first strike.
